name: Horror Of Old Castle
description:
Touring the old castle, no one expected to see the terrible monsters emerge from the dungeons. After sending your friends out for help, you were left to deal with the monsters. Well now the main goal is to hold out as long as possible, and kill the monsters.

This game features crowds of monsters and a lot of blood. Look for first aid kits and weapons and restrain the waves of monsters before reinforcements arrive.

Control keys:
0,1,2 etc. - Weapon change
WASD - Character movement
SPACEBAR - Jump
SHIFT - Sprint
Esc - Exit the menu
LMB - Shoot
PKM - Aim
